description:
This course is about reading more effectively, learning quicker and expanding your memory, training any one of these processes and it will benefit them all - but train them all become a master. Which means reading faster - much faster - PLUS develop your attention and enhancing your ability to learn.

When I wrote the book,The Extraordinary Reader, I had been speed reading for over 30 years and had spent 10 years teaching the techniques all over the world. And in all that time NO ONE had asked me to teach them how to read faster so that they could understand less of what they were reading and forget it more quickly!

So the emphasis on this course is on reading EFFECTIVELY and REMEMBERING more. Speed reading allows you to stream more information to your subconscious mind.

But you will also learn how to read more effectively with the unique INSEAK system - The INtelligent Strategy for the Effective Acquisition of Knowledge. A unique approach that you can apply to ALL of your reading for information and knowledge.

Speed reading not only makes you a faster reader, it increases your understanding as well. When you understand why a topic or a fact is important, you’ll remember it. Your improved memory will extend to other areas in your life as well.

Since memory is an aspect of creativity, you’ll also find that you’re more creative in everything you do.

With easy to follow videos and guided exercises - with specific information about how to practice so that you quickly master the techniques...and start to benefit from this course

Plus access to a bundle of online resources.
title: Extraordinary Learning: Speed Reading and Memory Mastery
